snippet: The five passes intercepted off Eli Manning on Sunday were only one element that led to the Giants’ fifth straight defeat. The team also continued to struggle on the ground.
lead_paragraph: The five passes intercepted off Eli Manning on Sunday were only one element that led to the Giants’ fifth straight defeat. The team also continued to struggle on the ground.

headline.main: Giants Seek to Revitalize Moribund Running Game
headline.print_headline: Giants Seek to Revitalize Moribund Running Game
